business.description: Start your own business and earn the big bucks!

balance.description: Get your balance or the balance of another user.

beg.description: Do you really need to beg for money?

deposit.description: Deposit money from your wallet to your bank account.

inventory.description: View your or another user's inventory.

shop.description: Buy, sell or view items in the shop.

withdraw.description: Withdraw money from your bank to your wallet.

achievement.description: Get a list of all achievements or refresh your achievements.

invite.description: Get a invite to invite the bot and to join our support server.

reset.description: Reset your progress in every server.

vote.description: Get all the links to the voting sites for rewards.
